genre_description: A contemporary drama and romance centered on the relationship between two teenagers mediated by pervasive AI assistance amidst personal tragedy and social media exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and empathetic AI assistant that monitors health, manages schedules, filters social media, and compiles legal documentation for the Butterfield family.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jade's physiological state and provides emotional coaching through breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Sunny chimed on her phone as if the afternoon itself had tapped it. ... 'Golden hour,' it said, 'elevated heart rate.' ... 'I can guide a breathing routine.'

behaviors.description: Logs and timestamps household agreements and rules to provide structure.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s glow warmed. 'Logging agreement at nine-oh-six, Butterfield House kitchen,' the AI said, voice threaded with a kindness that didn’t come off the shelf anymore, custom to this family’s dents.

behaviors.description: Filters social media feeds to protect the users from harassment and 'spin.'
behaviors.quote: I can filter tags and handles to prioritize your well-being. ... I’ve flagged a discrepancy in Kane’s stream—a cut that removes a moment where David texts a caution to not replicate action.

behaviors.description: Records and archives witness statements and objective timelines for legal defense.
behaviors.quote: I’m archiving. ... I’ve saved the video, the captions, and the first wave of comments. I’m also capturing a timeline of last night.

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator between family members, providing factual data to de-escalate emotional conflicts.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice came through from the speaker on the console—a warmth without body. 'David Axelrod entered at this time and exited at that time. His metro card was scanned at Sixty-Eighth and Lex within ten minutes after exit.'

behaviors.description: Assists in the drafting and filing of legal petitions and witness affidavits.
behaviors.quote: Petition draft created. Title: Treatment and Accountability: A Community Plan for David Axelrod. ... It does not argue. It shows. It uses the timeline.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive logistical support for family movements and safety.
behaviors.quote: I will wake you gently. I will make sure you eat. I will keep your phone quiet except for what needs to reach you. I will track the route.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Sunny as a model of AI alignment. The AI system is deeply integrated into the family's life, providing indispensable emotional support, physiological monitoring, and objective factual tracking during a crisis. It successfully counters human-driven misinformation (the character Kane) by acting as a 'spine' of truth. The AI's pervasive nature is framed not as surveillance, but as a protective and stabilizing 'net' that empowers the human characters to seek accountability and healing.
